Web Design

Some mockups of the finished Jardin de France TX Website

These are mockups of the completed Jardin de France website rendered on various devices

16 December 2015

The Jardin de France TX website has been completed for some time now, but we never presented the finished site in a post.

We have put together a collection of cool mockups that display the website on different devices and in different settings. You can see more of the album on our Facebook page.

Did we mention it has a full screen video background?

We created a featured profile page for this project in our portfolio. You can read up on the details of the project at the link below.

Featured Profile Page: www.studioncreations.com/portfolio/jardin-de-france

Site Link: www.JardinDeFranceTX.com

If you are interested in having an original website created, contact the Studio N Creations team and get started today.
